modules.title: Introduction to Electromagnetism
modules.description: This module lays the foundation of electromagnetism, focusing on its historical significance and basic principles.

sections.title: History of Electromagnetism
sections.description: Learn about the groundbreaking discoveries and the scientists who paved the way for modern electromagnetics.

sections.title: Fundamental Concepts
sections.description: An overview of charge, electric fields, and magnetic fields, providing a base for more complex topics.

sections.title: Electromagnetic Force
sections.description: Introduction to the electromagnetic force, one of the four fundamental forces of nature.

modules.title: Electric Fields and Forces
modules.description: Dive deeper into electric fields, exploring their impact and the forces they exert on charges.

sections.title: Understanding Electric Fields
sections.description: Explains what electric fields are and how they are represented.

sections.title: Coulomb's Law
sections.description: Introduction to Coulomb's Law and its applications in calculating the force between charges.

sections.title: Electric Field Lines
sections.description: Illustrates how to visualize electric fields using field lines and their significance.

modules.title: Magnetic Fields and Forces
modules.description: This module explores magnetic fields, their sources, and the forces they exert.

sections.title: Sources of Magnetic Fields
sections.description: Discussion on natural and artificial sources of magnetic fields.

sections.title: Lorentz Force
sections.description: An introduction to the Lorentz force and how it affects moving charges in magnetic fields.

sections.title: Magnetic Field Lines
sections.description: A detailed look at magnetic field lines and what they tell us about the direction and magnitude of magnetic fields.

modules.title: Electromagnetic Induction
modules.description: Understand how changing magnetic fields can induce electrical currents and vice versa.

sections.title: Faraday's Law of Induction
sections.description: Learn about the discovery of electromagnetic induction and its fundamental principles.

sections.title: Lenz's Law
sections.description: Delves into Lenz's Law and its importance in predicting the direction of induced currents.

sections.title: Applications of Electromagnetic Induction
sections.description: Explore the practical applications of electromagnetic induction in technology and daily life.

modules.title: Maxwell's Equations
modules.description: Explore Maxwell's Equations and their significance in unifying electricity and magnetism into electromagnetism.

sections.title: Overview of Maxwell's Equations
sections.description: A concise introduction to the four equations that form the foundation of classical electromagnetism.

sections.title: Gauss's Law for Electricity
sections.description: In-depth discussion on Gauss's Law and its implications for electric fields and charge.

sections.title: Gauss's Law for Magnetism
sections.description: Explains the concept of magnetic monopoles and why Gauss's law applies to magnetism.

sections.title: Faraday's Law and Ampere's Law
sections.description: Detailed examination of the last two of Maxwell's Equations and their interconnectedness.

modules.title: Electromagnetic Waves
modules.description: Discover how electromagnetic fields propagate through space as waves.

sections.title: Nature of Electromagnetic Waves
sections.description: Introduction to the properties and the dual (wave and particle) nature of electromagnetic waves.

sections.title: The Electromagnetic Spectrum
sections.description: An overview of the entire electromagnetic spectrum, from gamma rays to radio waves.

sections.title: Applications of Electromagnetic Waves
sections.description: Explores how different electromagnetic waves are harnessed for technology and communication.

modules.title: AC Circuits and Transformers
modules.description: Learn about alternating current (AC) circuits, transformers, and their role in electrical power distribution.

sections.title: Introduction to AC Circuits
sections.description: Basic principles of alternating current and how AC circuits differ from DC circuits.

sections.title: Transformers
sections.description: Operation and applications of transformers in stepping voltage levels up or down.

sections.title: Power Distribution
sections.description: Understanding the electrical power distribution system and the role of AC circuits and transformers.

modules.title: Practical Applications of Electromagnetism
modules.description: Exploring the real-world applications of electromagnetism in modern technology and daily life.

sections.title: Motors and Generators
sections.description: Examining how electromagnetic principles are utilized in electric motors and generators.

sections.title: Telecommunications
sections.description: The role of electromagnetic waves in the development and functioning of telecommunications technology.

sections.title: Medical Applications
sections.description: Insight into the use of electromagnetism in medical imaging and treatment.

modules.title: Conclusion and Future of Electromagnetism
modules.description: Summarizing key concepts and exploring future trends and technologies in the field of electromagnetism.

sections.title: Review of Key Concepts
sections.description: A comprehensive review of the most important concepts covered in the course.

sections.title: Emerging Technologies and Research
sections.description: Discussing promising research and potential future advancements in electromagnetism.
